org.apache.giraph.partition

类 SimpleRangeWorkerPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.SimpleRangeWorkerPartitioner<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id type
    V - Vertex value type
    E - Edge value type
    M - Message data type
    所有已实现的接口:
    WorkerGraphPartitioner<I,V,E,M>

    public abstract class SimpleRangeWorkerPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements WorkerGraphPartitioner<I,V,E,M>
    A range-based worker partitioner where equal-sized ranges of vertex ids are deterministically assigned to partitions. The user has to define a mapping from vertex ids to long keys dense in [0, keySpaceSize).

    • 构造器概要

      Constructor.

      Collection<PartitionStats> finalizePartitionStats(Collection<PartitionStats> workerPartitionStats, PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
      At the end of a superstep, workers have PartitionStats generated for each of their partitions.
      long getKeySpaceSize()
      Get key space size (can be used when implementing vertexKeyFromId()).

      Get a collection of the PartitionOwner objects.

      Convert a vertex id to a unique long key in [0, keySpaceSize].

      • finalizePartitionStats

        public Collection<PartitionStats> finalizePartitionStats(Collection<PartitionStats> workerPartitionStats,
                                                PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerGraphPartitioner
        At the end of a superstep, workers have PartitionStats generated for each of their partitions. This method will allow the user to modify or create their own PartitionStats interfaces to send to the master.
        指定者:
        finalizePartitionStats 在接口中 WorkerGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        workerPartitionStats - Stats generated by the infrastructure during the superstep
        partitionStore - Partition store for this worker (could be used to provide more useful stat information)
        返回:
        Final partition stats

      • updatePartitionOwners

        public PartitionExchange updatePartitionOwners(WorkerInfo myWorkerInfo,
                                      Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> masterSetPartitionOwners,
                                      PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerGraphPartitioner
        Get the partitions owners and update locally. Returns the partitions to send to other workers and other dependencies.
        指定者:
        updatePartitionOwners 在接口中 WorkerGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        myWorkerInfo - Worker info.
        masterSetPartitionOwners - Master set partition owners, received prior to beginning the superstep
        partitionStore - Partition store for this worker (can be used to fill the return map of partitions to send)
        返回:
        Information for the partition exchange.

      • getPartitionOwners

        public Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> getPartitionOwners()
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerGraphPartitioner
        Get a collection of the PartitionOwner objects.
        指定者:
        getPartitionOwners 在接口中 WorkerGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        返回:
        Collection of owners for every partition.
